Sentencas: A wide-range active and reactive power flow controller is designed to operate the inverter in pure leading, pure lagging, and the mix with active and reactive power conditions.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: The key to achieving lagging power flow control is to ensure sufficiently high enough dc bus voltage to avoid duty cycle saturation.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: The key to achieving precision power flow control for a wide range of power level is to adopt the quasi-proportional resonant controller for the current loop and the admittance compensator to cancel the grid-voltage-induced negative power How.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: In this paper, the current loop transfer function has been systematically derived for the controller design purpose.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: Phasor analysis was adopted to explain the need of dc bus voltage requirement.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: A 5-kVA grid-tie fuel cell inverter was used as the platform to show current loop controller design and admittance compensation.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: The proposed controller has been simulated, and the same parameters have been used for a DSP-based controller.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System

Sentencas: Both simulation and hardware experimental results agree well with the theoretical analysis.
Titulo: A Wide-Range Active and Reactive Power Flow Controller for a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Power Conditioning System
